thread.title: Transcript: Media Q&A With St. Louis Fed’s James Bullard in Washington

author: wsjcom
title: Transcript: Media Q&A With St. Louis Fed’s James Bullard in Washington

organizations.name: washington federal reserve bank of st. louis
media q&a with st. louis fed

text:
Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President James Bullard spoke Monday, Feb. 26, 2018 in Washington at a meeting of the National Association for Business Economics. After his presentation, he answered reporters’ questions. Here is a transcript of the exchange, lightly edited for length and clarity.
JAMES BULLARD: Hope you enjoyed a nice geeky talk at 8:00 on a Monday morning. (Laughter.) Get your week started off right.
But...
